cause.description:
Imagine a “campus” of after-school activities at numerous locations in a specific Providence neighborhood. This 'campus does not have an specific building or a specific after-school provider. It does not replace or compete for youth participants with existing providers. Rather, it is a network of providers in one neighborhood that have made a commitment to work together to provide more opportunities for middle school youth.
To explore this exciting project and vote for it go to:
http://www.membersproject.com
And remember to spread the word. Because the more Cardmembers that participate, the closer we get to $5 million.
Give the youth of Providence a chance to DREAM!!
1. promoted to youth and families as one series of programming to draw the greatest number of youth.
2. Organizes programs and activities into common time blocks so young people can participate in several different programs or activities during the course of one afternoon and week.
cause.mission: To prodive quality programs for middle school youth in Providence RI
cause.name: New Age of After-School- The Amerincan Express Members Project
